feature.label: STProfiler Binary Tools Feature
feature.description: This feature brings support for common binary utilities such as link to source, file checksum, nm, addr2line, ...
feature.copyright: (C) 2010 STMicroelectronics ALL RIGHTS RESERVED This program contains proprietary information and is not to be used, copied, nor disclosed without the written consent of STMicroelectronics.
